Package controller

Class MainReportsScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainReportsScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainReportsScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This reports controller class handles different types of reports for the application. Reports include total appointments by type and month, contacts schedule, users schedule, user login activity, and total number of customers by div.

    • sortByRadButtonClicked

      public void sortByRadButtonClicked()
      This method loads the table view to the correct data based on which radio button the user selects.

    • generateListOfReports

      public void generateListOfReports()
      This method creates a list for the total appointments and user schedules reports table by retrieving table data. The lambda expression inside the method is used to dynamically generate the table list.

    • contactScheduleDropDown

      public void contactScheduleDropDown(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method handles the select contact combo box for the contacts schedule table. The method loads all the appointments connected with the selected contact.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - contact combo box clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • fillUserLoginActivityTextArea

      public void fillUserLoginActivityTextArea()
      This method adds and records the user login activity from the readUserLoginActivityData method.

    • readUserLoginActivityData

      public List<String> readUserLoginActivityData()
      This method reads the data in the user login activity txt file: login_activity.txt.
      Returns:
      the lines (data) from the user login activity txt file.

    • backToMainButtonClicked

      public void backToMainButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method changes the current view and redirects the user back to the Main Screen Views Screen.
